issue.subject: Customized/Cool 404 Page
issue.description: We need to create a very catchy/funny 404 page for arkhitech.com for attracting attention from the blogosphere. A lot of mainstream blogs scan funny/unique 404 pages on the web and regularly feature them. For example, Chillopedia's 404 page was featured in various mainstream blogs (which brought free quality backlinks and traffic):- http://mashable.com/2011/01/16/funny-404-error-pages/- http://topcultured.com/68-awesome-404-error-pages/chillopedia-404-page-error/- http://www.alltechienews.com/posts/33-more-entertaining-404-error-pagesVarious Examples:http://www.simplyamusingdesigns.com/pinterest/
